prompt: Create a minimalist language selection screen with a clean, spacious design using soft pastel colors. Display a simple line-art globe icon at the top center. Show the title 'Pick a Language' in elegant typography. Arrange language options in a single-column list format with subtle dividers. Each language item should display flag, native name, and English name in a clean, left-aligned layout with gentle hover animations. Use soft pink and mint green accent colors. Include a rounded, pill-shaped continue button with soft shadows at the bottom.
